column4: if you connect the device and run:  lsusb  you can see the ID and search for guides
you can always try the liveCD to test
I am in Ubuntu 11.10 and the documentation for Ubuntu 11.10 states it supports 4G WiMax
what is the 8 character hex ID, the name is worthless
be right back, have to connect to it again, one second
Bus 001 Device 002: ID 0489:e016 Foxconn / Hon Hai Foxconn / Hon Hai
ok, so use '0489:e016'   and see if you can find guides
those pages refer to a defunct website
just pages I'm pulling up using that ID, you can do exactly the same
I have read that page, all pages that reference USB 4G WiMax and Ubuntu 11.10 refer back to that defunct webpage
